Ya, this is happening too...


## Installation

You can install the development version of `roundhouse` grom GitHub using
```{r, eval=FALSE}
if (!requireNamespace("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("bgreenwell/roundhouse")
```

## Basic usage

```{r}
roundhouse::random_fact()
```
